Hotel.name: My Story Hotel Tejo (Formerly Lisboa Tejo)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Lisboa Tejo in Lisbon (City Center), you'll be minutes from Figueira Square and Castle of Sao Jorge. This hotel is within close proximity of Sao Domingos Church and Dom Pedro IV Statue.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 58 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Hotel Lisboa Tejo. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Hotel Lisboa Tejo. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Lisboa Tejo in Lisbon (City Center), you'll be minutes from Figueira Square and Castle of Sao Jorge. This hotel is within close proximity of Sao Domingos Church and Dom Pedro IV Statue.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Figueira Square - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Sao Domingos Church - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Dom Pedro IV Statue - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Rossio Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Castle of Sao Jorge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Justa Elevator - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
National Theatre of D. Maria II - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Garagem Theater - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Armazens do Chiado Mall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Martim Moniz Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Hospital Sao Jose - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Santo Antonio Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lisbon Coliseum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Mude Design Moda Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Restauradores Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Lisboa Tejo is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room 1

Notice
* : TOURISTIC CITY TAX: A tax of 2,00 € per night/person (guests over 12 years), up to a maximum of 14,00 € per person, will be charged directly by hotel


From 01st January 2019, the City tax of Lisbon becomes 2€ per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of 14€ (Seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). Please note that the municipal fee it's NOT included in the room rate and it has to be paid by the guest at the check-out. Kids under 13 years are exempted.

Room 1
City Tax: Lisbon hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.
